io_png.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**************************************************************
00002  *  PNG FILE I/O ROUTINES. 
00003  *  Currently these allocates then frees memory but should
00004  *  optimise properly.
00005  **************************************************************/
00006 
00007 #include <png.h>
00008 #include <stdio.h>
00009 #include <stdlib.h>
00010 #include "spiceweasel.h"
00011 
00012 int read_png(char *filename, TRawFrame *frame)
00013 {
00014   char header[8];
00015   FILE *fp;
00016   png_structp png_ptr;
00017   png_infop info_ptr;
00018   int channels, width, height, bit_depth, color_type, rowbytes;
00019   int nbytes;
00020   int i;
00021   
00022   /* OPEN FILE */
00023   if(!(fp = fopen(filename, "rb")))
00024     return(IO_ERROR_OPEN);  /* Could not open */
00025 
00026   /* READ THE FILE HEADER */
00027   fread(header, 1, 7, fp);
00028   if(png_sig_cmp(header, 0, 7)) {
00029     return(IO_ERROR_FORMAT); /* File not PNG */
00030   }
00031   fclose(fp);
00032   fp = fopen(filename, "rb");
00033   
00034   /* ALLOCATE MEMORY */
00035 
00036   png_ptr = png_create_read_struct(PNG_LIBPNG_VER_STRING, 
00037                                    NULL, NULL, NULL);
00038   if(!png_ptr)
00039     return(IO_ERROR_OTHER); /* PNG Error */
00040 
00041   info_ptr = png_create_info_struct(png_ptr);
00042   if (!info_ptr) {
00043     png_destroy_read_struct(&png_ptr,
00044                             (png_infopp)NULL, (png_infopp)NULL);
00045     return(IO_ERROR_OTHER); /* PNG Error */
00046   }
00047 
00048   /* READ PNG HEADER */
00049   png_init_io(png_ptr, fp);
00050 
00051   png_read_info(png_ptr, info_ptr);
00052 
00053   /* Extract header */
00054 
00055   channels   = png_get_channels(png_ptr, info_ptr);
00056   width      = png_get_image_width(png_ptr, info_ptr);
00057   height     = png_get_image_height(png_ptr, info_ptr);
00058   bit_depth  = png_get_bit_depth(png_ptr, info_ptr);
00059   color_type = png_get_color_type(png_ptr, info_ptr);
00060   rowbytes   = png_get_rowbytes(png_ptr, info_ptr);
00061   
00062   /* SET INPUT TRANSFORMATIONS */
00063 
00064   /* Strip out alpha channel */
00065   if (color_type & PNG_COLOR_MASK_ALPHA)
00066     png_set_strip_alpha(png_ptr);
00067   
00068   /* Store each pixel in at least one byte */
00069   if (bit_depth < 8)
00070     png_set_packing(png_ptr);
00071 
00072   /* Number of bytes per pixel */
00073   nbytes = 1;
00074   if(bit_depth > 8)
00075     nbytes = 2;
00076  
00077   frame->channels = channels;
00078 
00079   /* Check if the frame has been allocated */
00080   if(frame->allocated) {
00081     /* Data already allocated - check same size */
00082     if((frame->width != width) || 
00083        (frame->height != height) || 
00084        (frame->rowbytes != rowbytes)) {
00085       return(IO_ERROR_SIZE);
00086     }  
00087   }else {
00088     /* Allocate memory. Note organised in COLUMNS */
00089     frame->data = (unsigned char**) malloc(sizeof(unsigned char*)*height);
00090     for(i=0;i!=height;i++)
00091       frame->data[i] = (unsigned char*) malloc(rowbytes*sizeof(unsigned char));
00092     frame->width = width;
00093     frame->height = height;
00094     frame->allocated =  1;
00095     frame->bpp = bit_depth;
00096     frame->rowbytes = rowbytes;
00097   }
00098 
00099   /* READ PNG DATA */
00100   
00101   png_read_image(png_ptr, frame->data);
00102   
00103   png_destroy_read_struct(&png_ptr, &info_ptr, NULL);
00104   
00105   fclose(fp);
00106   
00107   return(0);
00108 }
00109 
00110 int write_png(char *filename, TRawFrame *frame)
00111 {
00112   FILE *fp;
00113 
00114   png_structp png_ptr;
00115   png_infop   info_ptr;
00116 
00117   /* OPEN FILE */
00118   if(!(fp = fopen(filename, "wb")))
00119     return(IO_ERROR_OPEN);  /* Could not open */
00120 
00121   /* Allocate memory */
00122   png_ptr = png_create_write_struct(PNG_LIBPNG_VER_STRING, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00123   if (!png_ptr)
00124     return(IO_ERROR_OTHER);
00125   
00126   info_ptr = png_create_info_struct(png_ptr);
00127   if (!info_ptr) {
00128     png_destroy_write_struct(&png_ptr,
00129                              (png_infopp)NULL);
00130     return(IO_ERROR_OTHER);
00131   }
00132 
00133   png_init_io(png_ptr, fp);
00134 
00135   if(frame->channels == 1) {
00136     /* Write greyscale */
00137     png_set_IHDR(png_ptr, info_ptr, frame->width, frame->height,
00138                  frame->bpp, PNG_COLOR_TYPE_GRAY, PNG_INTERLACE_NONE,
00139                  PNG_COMPRESSION_TYPE_DEFAULT, PNG_FILTER_TYPE_DEFAULT);
00140   }else {
00141     /* Should be 3 channel RGB */
00142     png_set_IHDR(png_ptr, info_ptr, frame->width, frame->height,
00143                  frame->bpp,PNG_COLOR_TYPE_RGB, PNG_INTERLACE_NONE,
00144                  PNG_COMPRESSION_TYPE_DEFAULT, PNG_FILTER_TYPE_DEFAULT);
00145   }
00146   png_set_rows(png_ptr, info_ptr, frame->data);
00147 
00148   png_write_png(png_ptr, info_ptr, PNG_TRANSFORM_IDENTITY, NULL);
00149 
00150   png_write_end(png_ptr, NULL);
00151   
00152   png_destroy_write_struct(&png_ptr, &info_ptr);
00153 
00154   fclose(fp);
00155 
00156   return(0);
00157 }
